official-title.#text:
To increase the quantity of solar photovoltaic electricity by providing rebates for the purchase
			 and installation of an additional 10,000,000 photovoltaic systems by 2024,
			 and for other purposes.

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the
Congress finds that—

increasing the quantity of electricity generated from domestic renewable energy sources enhances
			 national energy security;

investments in solar energy and other renewable energy sources lead to the creation of green jobs
			 that provide substantial economic benefits;

the United States solar industry employed more than 140,000 people spread across all 50 States in
			 2013, which is a 53 percent increase over 2010, according to the Solar
			 Foundation; and

the solar industry is investing almost $15,000,000,000 in the United States economy annually,
			 according to GTM Research and the Solar Energy Industries Association.
